translations: v．强调，突出：使某事物更加明显或显著。
· The new dress accentuates her slim waist.
新裙子突显了她纤细的腰身。

sentences.sentence: His shaven head accentuates his large round face.
sentences.translation: 他剃了的光头突出了他的大圆脸。

sentences.sentence: All this activity simply accentuates the structural crisis.
sentences.translation: 但是所有这些活动只是加剧了结构性危机。

sentences.sentence: This accentuates his physical size and suggests body confidence.
sentences.translation: 这个行为表现了他的体型和肢体信心。
